text: Arrange the Crispix cereal, nuts and pretzels on the baking pan/tray. Mix together to evenly distribute the contents. Pour the melted butter into a bowl. Stir in the garlic salt, onion salt, lemon juice and Worcestershire sauce until thoroughly combined. Pour the melted butter mixture of the cereal mix on the pan. Coat the cereal, nuts and pretzels evenly, using a pastry brush to help if needed. Place in the oven and bake at 250ºF for approximately 45 minutes. Keep checking the mixture and stir it every 15 minutes to prevent sticking. During the cooking, spread out paper towels on the kitchen bench to allow the mix to cool off.  Remove from the oven and spread out on the paper towels to cool.  Serve immediately after cooling. It is best placed in a bowl or a series of small bowls.
